about.html: An irreverent campaign to promote the shock-absorbing qualities of ASICS GEL technology: gel.tv was designed as a fake e-commerce platform resembling Japanese TV-shopping channels, which sold all sorts of strange products made of GEL. The campaign won two Silver Cyber Lions in Cannes.
